comment: He taught MGT 3600, which was Intro to Intentional Business. If you want a super easy class that you can count on being an A at the end of the semester, take this class. Graded by easy smartbook quizzes every week, 2 case studies, and a final exam along with a group paper, which is easy if everyone puts in their work, but super easy grader!

I had him for MGT 7050 but for some reason that class is not possible to select. Overall he's a great teacher and would take again if given the chance. This particular class had a LOT of material crammed into a 7-week semester so it moves fast. His grading and assignments were fair. The final was a bit harder than I anticipated.

Overall easy class, but a lot of quizzes. On written assignments, such as discussion posts and the group project, he gave very good feedback, which showed that he really cares about his students. Cumulative final, but not too bad. Study the book and put in some effort and you'll be fine!
